channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 04f6c337-ffae-414c-b00f-3e80c9ab8a2c
Display name: Garnet Data Owner
Description: Allows read, write, destructive and scripting actions on the Garnet resource
Link: https://management.azure.com/04f6c337-ffae-414c-b00f-3e80c9ab8a2c?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 1694e55a-2496-4d07-b005-7259aa3fcbe8
Display name: Garnet Data Contributor
Description: Allows read and write access to all keys within the Garnet resource
Link: https://management.azure.com/1694e55a-2496-4d07-b005-7259aa3fcbe8?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 2a94a2fd-3c4f-45d1-847d-6585ba88af94
Display name: Firmware Analysis Reader
Description: View firmware images but not upload them or perform any workspace configuration
Link: https://management.azure.com/2a94a2fd-3c4f-45d1-847d-6585ba88af94?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 7021ea36-e168-4bc0-af53-88de51d20665
Display name: Garnet Script Data Contributor
Description: Allows execution and management of scripts on the Garnet resource
Link: https://management.azure.com/7021ea36-e168-4bc0-af53-88de51d20665?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: d9cd91b9-dada-4fa9-9406-454c4659c137
Display name: Garnet Data Reader
Description: Allows read access to all keys within the Garnet resource
Link: https://management.azure.com/d9cd91b9-dada-4fa9-9406-454c4659c137?api-version=2022-04-01
